channel.title: Posts on Adrea Snow
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Adrea Snow

item.title: I moved my academic blog
item.description: I’ve been working at Xero 5 months now and am absolutley loving working in tech again, so I decided to make my social presence more reflective of this fact. This website is made in HUGO, it’s hosted on Github, and is deployed using Github Actions. If you’d like to access my old site, it’ll still be up under adreasnow.com/acadmeic, so that I can keep adreasnow.com for my techy stuff instead 🙂
item.content:
I’ve been working at Xero 5 months now and am absolutley loving working in tech again, so I decided to make my social presence more reflective of this fact. This website is made in HUGO, it’s hosted on Github, and is deployed using Github Actions.

If you’d like to access my old site, it’ll still be up under adreasnow.com/acadmeic, so that I can keep adreasnow.com for my techy stuff instead 🙂
